features: NEWBORN PACIFIERS 0-6 MONTHS: Immerse your little one in comfort with our Natural Rubber Pacifiers. Specifically designed for babies aged 0-6 months, these feature a cherry-shaped nipple that closely mimics breastfeeding for a soothing experience.

CHIC STYLE & SAFETY: Each natural rubber pacifier includes a shield with large air holes that is accented with a cable-style handle, adding a touch of fashion while meeting ASTM safety standards. Our pacifiers are also BPA-free and PVC-free.

SET OF 2 INFANT PACIFIERS: Each pack includes 2 pacifiers in 2 coordinating shades. At Itzy Ritzy, we offer not just pacifiers but an essential accessory that complements your newborn baby essentials with both style and functionality.

BEST PACIFIER FOR BREASTFED BABIES: Mimic the comforting feel of breastfeeding. The natural rubber nipple provides a nurturing touch, making these pacifiers an ideal choice for newborns, for a seamless transition & soothing experience.

ITZY RITZY NEWBORN ESSENTIALS: Discover our trusted baby essentials. These chic pacifiers for babies aged 0-6 months meet safety standards while adding a stylish flair to your baby's accessories. Secure and essential for your little one's early stages.
body.description: Are you searching for the perfect pacifier that combines safety, style, and comfort for your little one? Look no further than Itzy Ritzy Natural Rubber Pacifiers – a delightful blend of functionality and fashion. Picture this: a soothing pacifier designed for newborns aged 0-6 months, crafted with a natural rubber nipple that mimics the comforting feel of breastfeeding. What sets it apart? The benefits of natural rubber, offering not only a gentle touch but also a cherry-shaped nipple to mimic the feel of breastfeeding. Our natural rubber pacifiers feature a shield with large air holes and meet ASTM safety standards. And that's not all – the pacifier boasts a unique cable design detail on the plastic handle, adding a touch of chic style to the equation. Say goodbye to worries and hello to peace of mind, as these chic pacifiers are BPA-free and PVC-free, elevating your baby's essentials with a secure, stylish, and naturally soothing solution. Make each moment comforting and chic with Itzy Ritzy's Natural Rubber Pacifiers – where safety meets style in perfect harmony for your little one's early stages.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎‎Before first use place in boiling water for 5 minutes. Watch that the pacifier is not touching the bottom of the pot. Remove, allow to cool and squeeze any water from the nipple. Clean before each use in warm water with mild soap. Rinse thoroughly with clean water. Do not clean with abrasive cleaning agents. Not suitable for dishwasher, microwave or sterilizer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Our Brand Itzy Ritzy takes pride in offering stylish solutions to every day parenting challenges. Our product line includes diaper bags, breastfeeding scarves, reusable snack bags, shopping cart covers and much more. From multi-purpose designs that empower to chic prints that inspire, we've reinvented practical luxury for modern families around the world while remaining true to our core vision of keeping things simple. Itzy Ritzy Natural Rubber Itzy Soother Pacifiers Natural Rubber Nipple Closely Mimics Breastfeeding Help soothe your sweetie in style with these adorable natural rubber pacifiers! Each natural rubber pacifier nipple is cherry-shaped to closely mimic breastfeeding, and the handle on each natural rubber pacifier is accented with a cable detail. Our pacifiers meet ASTM safety standards and are BPA free. The natural rubber nipple on our Itzy Soother pacifiers is cherry-shaped to closely mimic breastfeeding The handle of each pacifier features precious cable detailing Sold as a 2-pack of coordinating pacifiers Designed for ages 0 - 6 months

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best binky for my baby
reviews.reviewText: This brand and shape of binky has been the only one my now 7 month old will take! I received the first round I had as a gift, and ended up ordering more when the others were worn out.I usually try not to use binkys with my children as I prefer life without them for a number of reasons. However, my youngest son has been quite different from my first and he has needed that extra tool for calming.I appreciate that this binky is so lightweight, unlike a lot that are way too heavy to be held in a baby’s mouth. This one seems much more “safe” in that regard. I do believe that the shape of this binky is why my son likes it and can hold it in his mouth- he has a higher palate and a tongue tie so other binkies are hard to hold.Usually they recommend against binkies for tongue tied babies, but I believe in moderation and I do try to remove the binky when he’s asleep so that he maintains appropriate mouth posture and tongue position.Like other reviews have mentioned, I was surprised when I opened the new binkies I ordered and they seemed much smaller than the old and very used one we were replacing. But that was because the older one got so stretched out and soft because of the material, that it actually got bigger. I was worried my son wouldn’t take to the new ones. Although he seemed disinterested at first, he did finally take to them after a couple days of practice.I also love the look of these, even though that would be the last on my list of reasons for buying a binky. It doesn’t hurt that they are cute and super simple, and come in great color combos.Thankful for these binkies for baby’s like this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought theses for my cousins baby and she loves them. She hasn't had the bay yet so idk if the baby liked them. But they seem to be a really good binkie and overall they are super nice. and worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hands Down, the best
reviews.reviewText: My ebf baby rejected SO many pacis before we found this one! Mam, Avent, Nuk....he hated all of them and spit them out immediately. The Itzy Ritzy is the only one he'll take and keep in his mouth. Great price point, great value, and a happy baby!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are the only pacifiers my son will use
reviews.reviewText: Our family has loved these pacifiers so much we often give them as gifts to friends having babies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These pacifiers are amazing. in case anyone’s child has the same anatomy, they came recommended by an IBCLC for those babies with high arches/palates, like my son!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are our favorite paci’s. My son decided these were her favorite out of trying every brand. I love water doesn’t get on the inside and the rubber is not hard. Easy to clean and obviously super cute

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and small
reviews.reviewText: I got both the dark green and light beige packages of these. They are pretty small and look like they will fit my baby's mouth nicely. I have not had a chance to use them as my baby hasn't been born yet however they came packaged perfectly and everything looks great. I saw someone say they were a bit large but to me they are pretty small and a lot smaller than the Ryan and Rose sets, which is why I went with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good paci!
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter will only take this type of paci we’ve tried them all, these are very stylish, and such fun colors to go with outfits, we got them in every color. I would give them 5 stars but I feel like they stretch out a little sooner than the other brands that have this a similar product, but still last within the recommended replacement time and a good value! Great buy other than that!
